nutrition.description: Defines how much hunger this food restores.

saturation.description: Defines how much saturation this food adds. Saturation is the delay until hunger restarts.

meat.description: Defines if the food is considered meat. Meats are appealing to carnivores like wolves.

fast.description: Defines if the food can be eaten fast.

always_eat.description: Defines if the food can be eaten with a full stomach. Should only be used for snack foods and not big meals.

effects.description: Defines a list of effects that are applied when the food is eaten.

duration.description: Defines how long the effect lasts, in ingame ticks (20ths of a second).

amplifier.description: Defines how strong the effect is. Higher numbers increase the potency of the effect further.

ambient.description: Defines if the effect should be considered an ambient effect such as coming from a beacon. Ambient effects appear in a different color and without a countdown. It is advised not to set the "ambient" property to true for foods and other contextual effects.

show_particles.description: Defines if the effect produces particles around the player.

show_icon.description: Defines if the effect has an icon in the top right of the HUD.
